title: Necessity for bank charter
context: ยง412:5-101 Necessity for bank charter. Except as expressly permitted by federal law or this chapter, no person shall engage in any activity for which a charter to operate as a bank is required by this chapter, including without limitation the solicitation, acceptance, and holding of deposits in the State, the use of the term &ldquo;bank&rdquo;, or the exercise of such other powers or privileges restricted to banks under applicable law unless it is a corporation incorporated in this State and has such a charter.
